short_summary: This solicitation is for the supply of Office Furniture
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================

### Tender Details

* **Title**: Furniture - Category 6
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017596
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000070588
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-10T15:00:00

### Tender Status

This tender has expired.

### Procurement Details

* **Commodity Group**: Office Furniture (*N7110)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Locations

* **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Environment Canada
* **Point of Contact**: Samantha Hatzinikou ([Samantha.Hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Samantha.Hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca))
* **Address**: 200 Sacre-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3

### Attachments

Documents supporting this tender announcement are available for download from the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/30/eb6d55934f02cd12199747a53e01408b/rfb_5000070588-3_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/7bfee5bd152d8cdd69affe037e1ab7b4/rfb_5000070588-5_fr.pdf
